author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oil and butter in a frying pan and fry the onion and garlic until softened but not coloured. Add the peas and stock and bring to a gentle simmer. Cook until the peas are tender, about 5-8 minutes. Remove from the heat. Stir in the fresh mint and blend until smooth with a hand blender. Serve in a bowl garnished with a drizzle of olive oil.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra to serve,  25g/1oz butter,  ½ onion, finely chopped,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped,  100g/3½oz fresh peas,  200ml/7fl oz vegetable stock,  2 tbsp chopped fresh mint
